desc.desc_basic: Sourced from healthy newborn calves (≤10 days old) from high-quality ranches in China and abroad.
desc.desc_scope: Suitable for diagnostic reagent manufacturing (ELISA/chemiluminescence); recommended for ELISA kits such as HIV; ideal for engineered cell culture, e.g., PK-15, ST, and Vero cells.
desc.desc_features: Low hemoglobin (<100 mg/L), low γ-globulin (<2 mg/mL), high batch-to-batch stability.
desc.desc_storage: Store frozen at −5°C to −20°C; avoid repeated freeze–thaw cycles; shelf life: 5 years.
